title-group.article-title: FINITE DIFFERENCE SOLUTION OF A NONLINEAR KLEIN-GORDON EQUATION WITH AN EXTERNAL SOURCE

abstract.p: In this paper, we consider the Darboux problem for a (1+ 1)-dimensional cubic nonlinear Klein-Gordon equation with an external source. Stable finite difference scheme is constructed on a four-point stencil, which does not require additional iterations for passing from one level to another. It is proved, that the finite difference scheme converges with the rate O(h²), when the exact solution belongs to the Sobolev space $W_2^2 $ .
